faq.title: Technical FAQ
faq.subtitle: Expert Answers to Common Architecture Questions

questions.q: How does Server-Side Rendering (SSR) affect SEO rankings?
questions.a: SSR ensures search engines receive fully rendered HTML on first request, significantly improving indexing speed and ranking potential compared to client-side SPAs.

questions.q: What is the main benefit of Headless Commerce?
questions.a: Headless architecture separates frontend from backend, allowing optimal performance and a tailored user experience without platform template restrictions.

questions.q: How do you ensure scalability under high load?
questions.a: We use microservices, containerization (Kubernetes), and event-driven architectures, enabling components to scale independently based on real-time demand.

questions.q: Why are Core Web Vitals important for business apps?
questions.a: Google considers Core Web Vitals as ranking signals. High LCP and CLS scores improve user retention and increase search visibility.
